query.name: organismGenes_GOterms
query.longDescription: Show the GO terms for all genes from a specified organism.

constraint.description: Show the GO terms for all genes from organism:

template.name: Organism_GOtermsOrthologues
template.title: Organism --> GO terms + Orthologues in one specific organism

query.name: Organism_GOtermsOrthologues
query.longDescription: Show the GO terms for all genes in a particular organism which have an orthologue in another organism.

constraint.description: for genes which have an orthologue in:

query.name: BDGP_Gene
query.longDescription: For a specified ImaGo term and/or stage range, show all the D. melanogaster genes that are associated with it according to the BDGP in situ project. (Data Source: BDGP).
query.constraintLogic: C and D and A and B

template.name: Intergenic_RegRegion
template.title: Intergenic region --> Regulatory elements
template.comment: templates duplicates results when intergenic identifier is in output

query.name: Intergenic_RegRegion
query.longDescription: For the following intergenic region from D. melanogaster, show all regulatory elements with their chromosomal locations and lengths. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly, enhancers from FlyBase and predicted sites from Tiffin. (Data Source: FlyBase, REDfly, Tiffin).

query.name: DrosDel_GeneLocation
query.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster genes interrupted by a specific DrosDel deletion. Show the chromosomal locations of the deletion and the genes. (Data Source: FlyBase).

template.name: Gene_upstreamRegulatoryRegions
template.title: Gene --> Regulatory elements in the upstream intergenic region
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_upstreamRegulatoryRegions
query.longDescription: For a particular gene, show any regulatory elements found in its upstream intergenic region and the chromosome location of these regions. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly and enhancers from FlyBase. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase).

pathDescription.description: Gene > Upstream intergenic region > chromosome location

query.name: Organism_transposableElementInsertionSites
query.longDescription: Show all transposable element insertion sites for a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show all transposable element insertion sites for organism:

template.name: modENCODE_RNA_seq_Tissues
template.title: RNA_seq --> Genes expressed in a set of tissues

query.name: modENCODE_RNA_seq_Tissues
query.longDescription: Show genes expressed in a set of tissues/stages according to the modENCODE RNA_seq data. The expression scores are binned into the expression levels as follows: No/Extremely low expression: 0-0; Very low expression: 1-3; Low expression: 4-10; Moderate expression: 11-25; Moderately high expression: 26-50; High expression: 51-100; Very high expression: 101-1000; Extremely high expression: >1000;

template.name: Pathway_GenesOrthol_new2
template.title: Pathway --> Genes + Orthologues in one specific organism

query.name: Pathway_GenesOrthol_new2
query.longDescription: Show all the genes known to be involved in a specific KEGG, REACTOME or FlyReactome pathway and their orthologous genes in one specific organism. (Data Source: KEGG, Reactome, FlyReactome, inParanoid, Drosophila consortium).
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show all genes for the following pathway:
and give the orthologous genes from:
Use pathway dataset (KEGG, Reactome or FlyReactome):

query.name: ChromLocation_TFBindingSiteLocationGeneFactor
query.view: TFBindingSite.chromosome.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.name TFBindingSite.factor.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.factor.name TFBindingSite.gene.regulatoryRegions.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster chromosomal location, show all REDfly TF binding sites with their locations and associated genes and transcription factors. (Data Source: REDfly).
query.constraintLogic: A and C and B and D

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites

constraint.description: Show transcription factor binding sites, transcription factors and associated genes on D. melanogaster chromosome:

query.name: Gene_proteindomain
query.longDescription: Show protein domain information for the proteins of a specified gene.

template.name: ListPathway
template.title: Gene A --> Pathways <-- Gene B
template.comment: Under development for in-list comparisons: ML

query.name: ListPathway
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.pathways.genes.primaryIdentifier Gene.pathways.genes.symbol Gene.pathways.genes.name Gene.pathways.name Gene.pathways.identifier Gene.pathways.dataSets.name Gene.pathways.genes.organism.shortName
query.longDescription: For a given Gene A (or List A of Genes) show any associated Pathway(s) in common with Gene B (or List B of Genes). Datasource: KEGG or REACTOME. Keywords: pathways, cascade, metabolism, reaction

query.name: organism_allGenes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show all the genes for a specified organism.

template.name: Gene_ExonLocation2
template.title: Gene --> Exons
template.comment: 07.02.07:re-written to work from gene identifier -Rachel. 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_ExonLocation2
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.exons.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.length Gene.exons.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: For a specific gene, show its exons with their chromosomal locations and lengths. To show exons for all genes, turn off the constraint on the gene name.

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location of the exons of gene:

template.name: NaturalTransposableElement_InsertedElements
template.title: Natural Transposable Element --> Inserted Elements + Chromosomal Location

query.name: NaturalTransposableElement_InsertedElements
query.longDescription: For a particular transposable element show the individual elements and their chromosomal locations.

constraint.description: Show inserted elements for natural transposable element:

query.name: Disease_gene_orthologue
query.view: Disease.identifier Disease.name Disease.genes.symbol Disease.genes.name Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Disease.genes.homologues.type Disease.genes.homologues.dataSets.name Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show the human genes associated with a specified disease and their orthologues. Optionally constrain the organism for which orthologues are shown.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: miRNAtargetGene_miRNAgene
query.longDescription: For a specified gene show any microRNA genes that are known to target it. (DataSet: miRBase).

query.name: Gene_RegulatoryRegion
query.longDescription: Show all known regulatory elements for a particular D. melanogaster gene. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly and enhancers from FlyBase. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase).

query.name: Organism_3UTR
query.longDescription: Show all 3' UTRs for a particular organism.

query.name: Gene_transcriptionFactors
query.longDescription: Show all known transcription factors for a particular D. melanogaster gene. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase).

template.name: Gene_GOAll
template.title: Gene --> GO terms + Parents of those terms

query.name: Gene_GOAll
query.longDescription: Given a gene show the associated GO terms, and all parents to the top of the directed graph. The query returns a column containing the assigned GO term and a column containing all parents of that primary assignment.

constraint.description: Show GO terms and their parents for gene:

query.name: Protein_Publication
query.view: Protein.name Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.uniprotName Protein.publications.pubMedId Protein.publications.firstAuthor Protein.publications.year Protein.publications.title Protein.primaryAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: This search returns the publications referenced by Uniprot in their annotation of the protein. It does not provide a comprehensive list of publications for the protein(s).

query.name: Clone_gene
query.longDescription: For a cDNA clone or list of clones give the corresponding gene identifiers.

template.name: OrganismGO_GenePointMutation
template.title: GO term name [D. melanogaster] --> Genes + Point mutations.

query.name: OrganismGO_GenePointMutation
query.longDescription: Show all D. melanogaster genes that have been annotated with a particular GO term and the point mutations which overlap these genes. (Data Source: GO Consortium, FlyBase).

constraint.description: Show genes and overlapping point mutations from:

template.name: GOterm_genesDrosDelDeletion
template.title: GO term name --> All genes with DrosDel deletions

query.name: GOterm_genesDrosDelDeletion
query.longDescription: Show all D. melanogaster genes that have been annotated with a particular GO term and the DrosDel deletions which would delete these genes. Show whether the deletion is available. (Data Source: GO, FlyBase, DrosDel).

template.name: Gene_Publications
template.title: Gene --> Publications
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Publications
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year
query.longDescription: Returns a list of publications that reference a specified gene. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

template.name: Gene_RegionLocation
template.title: Gene --> CRMs
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_RegionLocation
query.longDescription: For a specific gene from D. melanogaster, show its Cis-Regulatory Modules, their chromosomal locations and lengths. (Data Source: REDfly)

query.name: ChromLocation_RegulatoryRegion
query.longDescription: Show all regulatory elements in a particular chromosomal location in the D. melanogaster genome. Regulatory elements can include: CRMs and TF binding sites from REDfly, enhancers from FlyBase and predicted sites from Tiffin. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase, Tiffin).

constraint.description: Show all regulatory elements on D. melanogaster chromosome:

template.name: Gene_FlyAtlas
template.title: Gene --> FlyAtlas expression data
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_FlyAtlas
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.microArrayResults.mRNASignal Gene.microArrayResults.mRNASignalSEM Gene.microArrayResults.presentCall Gene.microArrayResults.enrichment Gene.microArrayResults.affyCall Gene.microArrayResults.dataSets.name Gene.microArrayResults.tissue.name
query.longDescription: For a given D. melanogaster gene, show expression data from FlyAtlas.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E and F

template.name: Transcriptionfactor_TFBindingSiteGene
template.title: Transcription factor --> TF binding sites + Binding site sequence

query.name: Transcriptionfactor_TFBindingSiteGene
query.view: TFBindingSite.factor.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.factor.symbol TFBindingSite.secondaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.gene.secondaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.symbol TFBindingSite.sequence.residues TFBindingSite.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For specified D. melanogaster transcription factor(s), show the binding sites, chromosomal locations, genes where the sites are located and give the sequence of the binding site, if any. (Data Source: Redfly).

pathDescription.description: Transcription factor binding site > data source
Transcription factor binding site > chromosome location

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites

template.name: GOterm_GenesInsertions
template.title: GO term name --> All genes with insertions

query.name: GOterm_GenesInsertions
query.longDescription: Show all D. melanogaster genes that have been annotated with a particular GO term and that have insertions. (Data Source: GO, FlyBase).

template.name: Gene_INDAC
template.title: Gene --> INDAC long oligos
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_INDAC
query.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene, search for corresponding INDAC long oligos.

template.name: Gene_Probe
template.title: Gene --> Affymetrix probe
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Probe
query.longDescription: Show affymetrix probes for a particular gene. (Data Source: Ensembl).

template.name: Gene_FlyAtlas_TissueList
template.title: Genes --> Expression in a set of tissues

query.name: Gene_FlyAtlas_TissueList
query.longDescription: Show genes expressed in a set of FlyAtlas tissues.

query.name: geneInteractiongene
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.role2 Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a given Gene A (or List A of Genes) show any interactions that occur with gene B (or List B of Genes)

query.name: Pathway_Genes
query.longDescription: For a specified KEGG, REACTOME or FlyReactome pathway, list all the genes that are involved for a particular organism

query.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in one organism. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: Protein_PublicationAll
query.view: Protein.name Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.publications.pubMedId Protein.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: This search returns the publications referenced by Uniprot AND the publications for the Gene. This gives two columns of pubmed Ids: the first for the publications from Uniprot and the second for the publications for the Gene. To create a single list of all publications, create a list for the first set and then add the second set to this list using the functions under 'Create/Add to list'.

template.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptINDAC
template.title: Chromosomal location --> Genes + transcripts + INDAC long oligos

query.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptINDAC
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.microarrayOligos.primaryIdentifier Gene.transcripts.microarrayOligos.sequence.residues
query.longDescription: Show the genes, transcripts and INDAC oligos located in a particular chromosome location.

constraint.description: Show genes, transcripts and Indac oligos located on chromosome:

query.name: organism_allmiRNA
query.longDescription: Show all miRNA for a specified organism.

query.name: Gene_CDSs
query.longDescription: For the selected organism retrieve all genes and their coding sequences, suitable for export as GFF3 or FASTA.

template.name: GO_Gene
template.title: GO term name [and children of this term] --> Genes in one specific organism

query.name: GO_Gene
query.longDescription: Find all genes that are associated with a particular GO term in a specific organism. This template will return genes that have been assigned the given GO term as well as genes that have a more specific GO term.

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with GO term (and any children of this GO term):

template.name: FlyRegBindingSite_TranscriptionFactor
template.title: REDfly TF binding site --> Gene + Transcription factor

query.name: FlyRegBindingSite_TranscriptionFactor
query.view: TFBindingSite.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.length TFBindingSite.gene.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.factor.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosome.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.sequence.residues TFBindingSite.publications.pubMedId TFBindingSite.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a particular transcription factor binding site from REDfly, give the gene, factor, chromosomal location, sequence and pubmed id. (Data Source: REDfly).

pathDescription.description: Transcription factor binding site > chromosome location

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites

query.name: Gene_AdjacentGenes
query.longDescription: For a particular gene, find the upstream and the downstream adjacent genes.

query.name: Chromosome_CRMOverlappingInsertion
query.view: CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.dataSets.dataSource.name CRM.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.overlappingFeatures.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a specific chromosome from D. melanogaster, show all CRMs with insertions. Show the chromosomal locations for each CRM and each insertion. (Data Source: REDfly, FlyBase).

query.name: Organism_NaturalTransposableElements
query.longDescription: For a particular organism list the natural transposable elements.

constraint.description: List the natural transposable elements for organism:

query.name: GotermGene2genes
query.longDescription: For a particular gene(s), show whether it is annotated to a specified GO term.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

query.name: Mutagen_Allele
query.view: Gene.alleles.primaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.secondaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.alleles.mutagens.description Gene.alleles.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster gene alleles created in a certain way. Give the corresponding gene for the allele. (Data Source: FlyBase).

template.name: Gene_FlyAtlasGO
template.title: Gene --> FlyAtlas expression data + GO
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_FlyAtlasGO
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.microArrayResults.tissue.name Gene.microArrayResults.presentCall Gene.microArrayResults.enrichment Gene.microArrayResults.affyCall Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.dataSets.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.dataSets.name Gene.microArrayResults.tissue.name
query.longDescription: For a given D. melanogaster gene, show the FlyAtlas results and the GO terms applied to the gene.

query.name: AlleleClass_Allele
query.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster gene alleles from a certain allele type. List the corresponding genes. (Data Source: FlyBase).

query.name: GOterm_gene_report
query.longDescription: For a specified GO term, show the set of genes with this annotation.

query.name: Chromosome_IntergenicSequence
query.longDescription: For a specified chromosome show all intergenic regions with their chromosomal locations and lengths. (Data Source: FlyMine).

template.name: Gene_TranscriptOrthologue
template.title: Gene --> Transcript + Transcripts for orthologues
template.comment: 07.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_TranscriptOrthologue
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name Gene.homologues.homologue.transcripts.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show the transcript identifiers for a particular gene and the transcript identifiers of its predicted orthologues. (Data Source: InParanoid, Drosophila Consortium).

template.name: Gene_Orth_seq
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues + Sequence
template.comment: Added 05.10.11:RL

query.name: Gene_Orth_seq
query.longDescription: For a given Gene (or List of Genes) in named organism (default: D. melanogaster) returns the orthologues and the sequence of the gene(s) and orthologous genes. Optionally constrain the organism for which orthologues are shown and the data source from which the orthologue predictions are derived. Currently orthologue predictions are available from TreeFam, Panther and the Drosophila 12 genomes project. [keywords: homologue, homolog, paralogue, paralogue, ortholog]

query.name: Chromosome_GeneInsertionLocation
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.overlappingFeatures.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a particular chromosome, show genes that have an insertion. Show the coordinates of each gene and each insertion. (Data Source: FlyBase). NOTE: Can be slow to run.

template.name: Gene_TimeCourseExpression
template.title: Gene [D. melanogaster] --> Microarray Time course expression data from Arbeitman et al.

query.name: Gene_TimeCourseExpression
query.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene show results from Arbeitman et al (2002) microarray time course expression. Optionally constrain by a specific stage and filter on the median signal ratio. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled mRNA representing all stages of the life cycle. To query general stages change = to LIKE and enter e.g. *Embryo* or *Adult*.
query.constraintLogic: B and C and D and A and E

constraint.value: Arbeitman M: Gene Expression During the Life Cycle of Drosophila melanogaster

constraint.description: Only show results which have a median signal ratio of:

query.name: AnatomyTerm_Region
query.view: CRM.anatomyOntology.name CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.length CRM.publications.pubMedId CRM.gene.regulatoryRegions.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: Show all the Cis-Regulatory Modules from REDfly that have been associated with a specific anatomy ontology term. (Data Source: REDfly).

query.name: FlyFish_Genes
query.longDescription: For a certain embryonic stage of D. melanogaster and a given expression term, show all the genes that are expressed according to the FlyFISH project.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: Gene_Location
template.title: Gene --> Chromosomal location
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Location
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.name Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.locations.start Gene.locations.end Gene.locations.strand
query.longDescription: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location of a particular gene.

constraint.description: Show the chromosome and the chromosome location for gene:

template.name: Gene_BDGPFlyFish
template.title: Gene --> FlyFish + BDGP in situ data

query.name: Gene_BDGPFlyFish
query.longDescription: For a specified D. melanogaster gene, show all results from the FlyFISH and the BDGP in situ projects. (Data Source: BDGP, FlyFISH).

template.name: TranscriptionFactor_Genes
template.title: TranscriptionFactor --> Genes that have binding sites for this factor
template.comment: this is redundant since we have Protein_TFBindingSiteChromosomeGene, no?

query.name: TranscriptionFactor_Genes
query.view: Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.secondaryIdentifier Gene.regulatoryRegions.factor.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: For specified transcription factor(s) show the genes associated binding sites

constraint.description: Show genes regulated by transcription factor:

query.name: Protein_GOterms_1
query.longDescription: Show the GO annotations for a protein or proteins from a specifc GO ontology (cellular_component, molecular_function, biological_process).

constraint.description: Show GO annotation for the following protein(s):

template.name: ChromLocation_CRMOverlappingTFBindingsite
template.title: Chromosomal location --> CRMs + TF binding sites overlapping these CRMs

query.name: ChromLocation_CRMOverlappingTFBindingsite
query.view: CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.length CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier CRM.overlappingFeatures.length CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end
query.longDescription: For a specific chromosomal location of D. melanogaster, show all CRMs and the TF binding sites that overlap these CRMs, according to REDfly. Show the chromosomal positions and lengths of all CRMs and TF binding sites.

query.name: ChromLocation_CRM
query.view: CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.length CRM.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: For a specific chromosomal location of D. melanogaster, show all Cis-Regulatory Modules from REDfly with their length and chromosomal coordinates. (Data Source:REDfly).

query.name: Probe_Gene
query.longDescription: For specified Affymetrix probeset(s) show the corresponding gene. (Data Source: Ensembl).

query.name: Gene_pathway_interactions
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or gene list, show any interactions with genes involved in a specified pathway.

query.name: Publication_Genes
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.year
query.longDescription: Show all genes that were mentioned in a specific publication. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

template.name: Gene_PointMutationLocation
template.title: Gene --> Point mutations
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_PointMutationLocation
query.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster gene, search for overlapping point mutations with their chromosomal coordinates. (Data Source: FlyBase).

template.name: GO_GeneOrthologues
template.title: GO term name (and children of this term) --> Genes in organism1 + Orthologues in organism2

query.name: GO_GeneOrthologues
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.parents.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a specified GO term (and children of this term) find all the genes in a particular organism that have an orthologue in another organism
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with GO term (and any children of this GO term):
and show the orthologues of these genes from:

query.name: MeSH_Publication
query.view: MeshTerm.name MeshTerm.publications.firstAuthor MeshTerm.publications.title MeshTerm.publications.year MeshTerm.publications.journal MeshTerm.publications.volume MeshTerm.publications.pages MeshTerm.publications.pubMedId
query.longDescription: For given MeSH term show all publications.

template.name: Stage_FlyFishBDGP
template.title: Stage --> FlyFish + BDGP in situ data

query.name: Stage_FlyFishBDGP
query.longDescription: For a given embryonic stage of Drosophila melanogaster, show which genes are expressed or not expressed according to the FlyFish and BDGP in situ projects.

template.name: Gene_Orth
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues
template.comment: Added 05.10.11:RL

query.name: Gene_Orth
query.longDescription: For a given Gene (or List of Genes) in named organism (default: D. melanogaster) returns the orthologues. Optionally constrain the organism for which orthologues are shown and the data source from which the orthologue predictions are derived. Currently orthologue predictions are available from TreeFam, Panther and the Drosophila 12 genomes project. [keywords: homologue, homolog, paralogue, paralogue, ortholog]

template.name: Gene_Protein
template.title: Gene --> Proteins
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Protein
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.proteins.primaryIdentifier Gene.proteins.primaryAccession Gene.proteins.isUniprotCanonical Gene.proteins.molecularWeight Gene.proteins.length Gene.proteins.isFragment
query.longDescription: Show the proteins for a particular gene

template.name: Gene_disease
template.title: Gene --> Human disease gene and OMIM disease

query.name: Gene_disease
query.view: Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Disease.genes.homologues.homologue.symbol Disease.genes.primaryIdentifier Disease.genes.symbol Disease.identifier Disease.name Disease.genes.homologues.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a given gene or set of genes show orthologous human genes which have an associated OMIM disease. Optionally constrain the search to use a particular orthologue mapping (Ensembl Compara or TreeFam).

constraint.description: Show human disease genes and associated OMIM disease for gene(s):

template.name: GeneTissue_FlyAtlas
template.title: Gene + Tissue --> FlyAtlas expression data
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: GeneTissue_FlyAtlas
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.presentCall Gene.microArrayResults.enrichment Gene.microArrayResults.affyCall Gene.microArrayResults.dataSets.name Gene.microArrayResults.tissue.name
query.longDescription: For a given D. melanogaster gene, show expression data for a particular tissue from FlyAtlas.(Data Source: FlyAtlas).
query.constraintLogic: B and A and D and C

template.name: Gene_IntronChromosome
template.title: Gene --> Introns
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_IntronChromosome
query.longDescription: For a particular gene, list the introns with their intron chromosomal locations and lengths. To show introns for all genes, turn off the constraint on the gene name.

constraint.description: Show transcripts and introns for gene:

query.name: Genes_Publications
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name
query.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in one organism. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: Gene_AdjacentGene_FlyAtlas_downstream
query.longDescription: For a particular gene or set of genes, give the downstream adjacent gene and any FlyAtlas data that satisfies certain constraints.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D and E

query.name: RNA_seq_Genes
query.longDescription: Show RNA_seq expression data for all genes at a specified developmental stage. Optionally also filter on expression level or expression score. Data source: modENCODE RNA_seq data analysed by FlyBase. Note: The expression scores are binned into the expression levels as follows: No/Extremely low expression: 0-0; Very low expression: 1-3; Low expression: 4-10; Moderate expression: 11-25; Moderately high expression: 26-50; High expression: 51-100; Very high expression: 101-1000; Extremely high expression: >1000;

constraint.description: Show RNA_seq expression data for developmental stage:
Show only those genes with an expression level:

template.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
template.title: Chromosomal location --> All genes + Transcripts + Exons

query.name: ChromLocation_GeneTranscriptExon
query.longDescription: For a specified organism and chromosomal location show all genes, transcripts and exons.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

query.name: protein_domain
query.longDescription: Show proteins and corresponding genes which have a specified protein domain or family.

constraint.description: Show proteins with domains of type:

template.name: AllGene_Chromosome
template.title: All genes in organism --> All chromosomal locations

query.name: AllGene_Chromosome
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.length Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier
query.longDescription: For a specified organism, show the chromosomal location and sequence length for all genes.

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

query.name: Disease_gene2
query.longDescription: Show the human genes associated with a specified disease.

query.name: Gene_Pathway
query.longDescription: Show the Pathway identifier(s) and name for the selected gene.

query.name: Gene_AlleleStocks
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.primaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.symbol Gene.alleles.alleleClass Gene.alleles.phenotypeAnnotations.description Gene.alleles.phenotypeAnnotations.annotationType Gene.alleles.stocks.primaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.stocks.stockCenter Gene.alleles.stocks.type
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or list of genes show the alleles and the stocks available. Optionally, you can filter the search with a specific allele of the gene and/or show only those stocks available from a specified stock centre.

constraint.description: Show alleles and available stocks for gene(s):
Optionally filter the search with a specific allele for the gene:

template.name: Gene_DrosophilaOrthologues
template.title: Gene --> Orthologues in other Drosophila species

query.name: Gene_DrosophilaOrthologues
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.primaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.secondaryIdentifier Gene.homologues.homologue.symbol Gene.homologues.homologue.organism.name Gene.homologues.type Gene.homologues.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene or list of genes show the orthologues in the other Drosophila species.

constraint.description: Show the Drosophila orthologues for gene(s):

query.name: Gene_1CDSsequence
query.longDescription: Show the CDS and its sequence for all genes from a particular organism. This template contains an additional constraint to limit the result to one CDS per sequence (e.g all -PA CDS from D. melanogaster).

constraint.description: that have this constraint in their primary identifier:

query.name: protein_domains2
query.view: Protein.uniprotAccession Protein.uniprotName Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.name Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.primaryIdentifier Protein.proteinDomainRegions.proteinDomain.type Protein.proteinDomainRegions.start Protein.proteinDomainRegions.end Protein.proteinDomainRegions.identifier Protein.proteinDomainRegions.database
query.longDescription: Show protein domains and families for a specified protein.

template.name: ECnumber_gene_protein
template.title: Enzyme Commission number --> Genes + Proteins in a specified organism

query.name: ECnumber_gene_protein
query.view: Protein.ecNumbers.identifier Protein.genes.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.name Protein.primaryAccession Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.organism.name
query.longDescription: For a specified Enzyme Commission (EC)number show the corresponding genes and proteins in a particular organism.

constraint.description: Show the genes and proteins in:

query.name: ProbeSet_FlyAtlas
query.view: ProbeSet.primaryIdentifier ProbeSet.results.presentCall ProbeSet.results.enrichment ProbeSet.results.affyCall ProbeSet.dataSets.name ProbeSet.results.dataSets.name ProbeSet.results.tissue.name
query.longDescription: Show the expression data of the following probeset in the FlyAtlas experiments. (Data Source: Affymetrix, FlyAtlas).

query.name: Tissue_Flyatlas
query.view: FlyAtlasResult.mRNASignal FlyAtlasResult.mRNASignalSEM FlyAtlasResult.presentCall FlyAtlasResult.enrichment FlyAtlasResult.affyCall FlyAtlasResult.genes.secondaryIdentifier FlyAtlasResult.genes.symbol FlyAtlasResult.material.primaryIdentifier FlyAtlasResult.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show gene expression in the following tissue from D. melanogaster and the Affymetrix probes that were used to obtain these data.(Data Source: FlyAtlas).
query.constraintLogic: C and B and D and E and A

constraint.description: that were detectably expressed in the following number of arrays (out of 4):

query.name: Gene_BDGP
query.longDescription: For a certain D. melanogaster gene, show the results from the BDGP in situ project. (Data Source: BDGP).

query.name: Gene_RNA_seq
query.longDescription: For a specified gene or set of genes show the RNA_seq expression levels. Optionally constrain your search to genes with a particular expression level or score and/or show expression at a particular developmental stage. Data source: modENCODE RNA_seq data analysed by FlyBAse. Note: The expression scores are binned into the expression levels as follows: No/Extremely low expression: 0-0; Very low expression: 1-3; Low expression: 4-10; Moderate expression: 11-25; Moderately high expression: 26-50; High expression: 51-100; Very high expression: 101-1000; Extremely high expression: >1000;
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: Show RNA_seq expression data for gene(s):
Only show genes with an expression level of:

query.name: Gene_FlyFish
query.longDescription: For a certain gene from Drosophila melanogaster, show the mRNA embryonic localisation results from FlyFish.

template.name: Transcript_INDAC
template.title: Transcript --> INDAC long oligo
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from transcript class - Philip

query.name: Transcript_INDAC
query.longDescription: For specified transcript(s) show the corresponding INDAC microarray long oligo, along with its tm, length and sequence.

constraint.description: Give details of the INDAC microarray long oligo for the transcript:

template.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
template.title: Protein --> Gene
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from protein class - Philip

query.name: Protein_GeneChromosomeLength
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.genes.secondaryIdentifier Protein.genes.symbol Protein.genes.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.start Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.end Protein.genes.chromosomeLocation.strand Protein.genes.length
query.longDescription: Show the gene that codes for the following protein, with its chromosomal location and length.

query.name: Organism_Intergenic
query.longDescription: For a particular organism, show all intergenic regions with their chromosomal locations, lenghts and adjacent genes. (Data Source: FlyMine).

query.name: protein_interactions
query.view: Gene.proteins.uniprotAccession Gene.proteins.uniprotName Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.participant2.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.participant2.symbol Gene.interactions.details.type Gene.interactions.details.name Gene.interactions.details.role1 Gene.interactions.details.role2 Gene.interactions.details.experiment.interactionDetectionMethods.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.name Gene.interactions.details.experiment.publication.pubMedId Gene.interactions.details.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: For a specified protein, show physical and genetic interaction partners. Optionally constrain to show just physical or genetic interactions or interactions determined by a specific method.

constraint.description: Only show interactions determined by method:

query.name: GOTerm_Gene2
query.longDescription: Show genes annotated with a specified GO term. Optionally constrain the organism and the evidence code. (Includes 'with' annotation: the 'with' field holds an additional identifier for annotations using certain evidence codes)

constraint.description: Show genes annotated with GO term:

query.name: Dataset_TF_BindingSites
query.view: TFBindingSite.factor.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.factor.symbol TFBindingSite.secondaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.start TFBindingSite.chromosomeLocation.end TFBindingSite.gene.secondaryIdentifier TFBindingSite.gene.symbol TFBindingSite.sequence.residues TFBindingSite.dataSets.name
query.longDescription: Show all the binding sites for the transcription factors according to the REDfly dataset.

pathDescription.description: Transcription factor binding site > data source
Transcription factor binding site > chromosome location

constraint.value: REDfly Drosophila transcription factor binding sites

template.name: Gene_agLifecycleExpression
template.title: Gene [A. gambiae] --> Microarray time course data from Koutsos et al. (filter on stage)

query.name: Gene_agLifecycleExpression
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.standardError Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.firstAuthor Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: For a particular A. gambiae gene, show its expression according to the data of Koutsos et al at a particular developmental stage. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE embryo; larva; pupa; adult female; adult male; or adult. The templates Gene [A. gambiae] -> Life cycle expression data (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) allow you to filter on more specific stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled RNA produced in vitro from ESTs that were used as substrates to produce amplicons for the spotted microarrays.

template.name: Gene_Insertion
template.title: Gene --> Transposon insertions
template.comment: 06.06.07 updated to work from gene class - Philip

query.name: Gene_Insertion
query.longDescription: For a particular Drosophila gene, search for overlapping insertions. (Data Source: FlyBase).

query.name: InterPro_Domain_Family
query.longDescription: Search for protein domains and families by name. (Data Source: UniProt).

constraint.description: Seach for names that contain a particular string - use '*' as a wildcard:

template.name: Organism_NaturalTransposableElementsandSites
template.title: Organism --> Natural transposable elements and their insertion sites

query.name: Organism_NaturalTransposableElementsandSites
query.longDescription: For a particular organism show the natural transposable elements and their chromosomal insertion sites.

template.name: Gene_AdjacentGenesLocations
template.title: Gene --> Adjacent genes (upstream and downstream) + chromosome locations

query.name: Gene_AdjacentGenesLocations
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.downstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.primaryIdentifier Gene.downstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.symbol Gene.downstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.downstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.downstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.primaryIdentifier Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.adjacentGenes.symbol Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.upstreamIntergenicRegion.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: For a particular gene, find the upstream and the downstream adjacent genes and their chromosome locations.

query.name: AnatomyTerm_Alleles
query.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster alleles that have a phenotype in a specific anatomical structure and that are from a certain allele class. (Data Source: FlyBase)

constraint.description: Find alleles in the following tissue
and that are from the following allele class:

template.name: Gene_GO
template.title: Gene --> GO terms

query.name: Gene_GO
query.view: Gene.symbol Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.evidence.code.code Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.namespace Gene.goAnnotation.qualifier
query.longDescription: Search for GO annotations for a particular gene.

query.name: Chromosome_Gene
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand
query.longDescription: Show genes located on a particular chromosome.

query.name: Gene_RNAi
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.rnaiResults.phenotype Gene.rnaiResults.score Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.scoreType Gene.rnaiResults.reagentId Gene.rnaiResults.conditions Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.publication.pubMedId Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.name Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.assay Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.bioSourceName Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.bioSourceType Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.method
query.longDescription: Show RNAi phenotypes for a specified gene or genes.

constraint.description: Show RNAi phenotypes for the following gene:

query.name: PointMutation_Gene_Chromosome
query.view: PointMutation.primaryIdentifier PointMutation.chromosome.primaryIdentifier PointMutation.chromosomeLocation.start PointMutation.chromosomeLocation.end PointMutation.chromosomeLocation.strand PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.symbol PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end PointMutation.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand PointMutation.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a particular point mutation in D. melanogaster, search for overlapping genes. Show chromosomal coordinates for the point mutation and the genes. (Data Source: FlyBase).

query.name: Gene_transposableElementsOverlappingExons
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.primaryIdentifier Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.symbol Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.exons.overlappingFeatures.dataSets.dataSource.name
query.longDescription: For a particular gene show the transposon insertions that overlap its exons. (Data Source: FlyBase).

constraint.value: FlyBase data set for Drosophila melanogaster

query.name: miRNA_Targets
query.longDescription: For specified miRNA(s), find all predicted target transcripts and their genes. Show the location of the target sites, the score for each site and the p-value. (Data Source: miRBase).

constraint.description: Find all targets of the following miRNA gene:

template.name: TimeCourseData_Gene
template.title: Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on stage and ratio) --> Genes

query.name: TimeCourseData_Gene
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.isControl Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId
query.longDescription: Show gene expression data for a particular developmental stage according to the Arbeitman et al data set and filter this data on the median signal ratio. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE *Embryo*; *Larvae*; *Metamorphosis*; *Adult female* or *Adult male*. The templates Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) --> Genes [D. melanogaster], allow you to filter on more specific stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled mRNA representing all stages of the life cycle.

constraint.value: Arbeitman M: Gene Expression During the Life Cycle of Drosophila melanogaster

constraint.description: Show expression results for developmental stage:
Only show results which have a median signal ratio of:
